Fall_River.Central Congregational Church (Fall Rive:
Central Congregational Church is an historic church at 100 Rock Street in Fall River, Massachusetts.


== History ==
The church was built in 1875 and added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1983. It was designed by Boston architects Hartwell & Swasey, who also designed several other notable buildings in Fall River, including the Academy Building and several city fire stations.
